ewu.embroidit.parkc.pattern

Class EmbStitch

  • java.lang.Object
    • ewu.embroidit.parkc.pattern.EmbStitch

  • public class EmbStitch
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single embroidery stitch in a pattern.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javafx.geometry.Point2D absPosition 
      private int colorIndex 
      private int flag

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EmbStitch(javafx.geometry.Point2D absPosition)
      Constructs an embroidery stitch with the given position, initialized with a normal encoding.
      EmbStitch(javafx.geometry.Point2D absPosition, int flag)
      Constructs an embroidery stitch with the given position and encoding flag.
      EmbStitch(javafx.geometry.Point2D absPosition, int color, int flag)
      Constructs an embroidery stitch with the given absolute position, color, and machine code flag.
